tasks.title: Implement Clean Architecture in Flutter Application
tasks.description: The objective of this task is to refactor our existing Flutter application to adhere to Clean Architecture principles.

tasks.title: Update User Profile Page
tasks.description: Enhance the user profile page with additional information and customization options.

tasks.title: Implement Two-Factor Authentication
tasks.description: Add an extra layer of security by implementing two-factor authentication for user accounts.

tasks.title: Optimize Image Loading for Faster Performance
tasks.description: Improve the image loading process to optimize app performance and reduce loading times.

tasks.title: Integrate Google Maps API
tasks.description: Incorporate Google Maps API to provide location-based features within the application.

tasks.title: Create Automated Testing Suite
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive suite of automated tests to ensure the reliability of the application.

tasks.title: Implement Real-Time Chat Functionality
tasks.description: Integrate a real-time chat feature to allow users to communicate seamlessly within the app.

tasks.title: Enhance Search Algorithm
tasks.description: Improve the search algorithm to provide more accurate and relevant results to users.

tasks.title: Update App Icon and Splash Screen
tasks.description: Refresh the app icon and splash screen to give the application a modern and polished look.

tasks.title: Implement Offline Mode
tasks.description: Enable users to access certain features of the app even when offline, enhancing overall usability.

tasks.title: Create User Feedback Survey
tasks.description: Develop a survey to gather user feedback and improve the application based on user preferences.

tasks.title: Fix Bug in User Authentication Module
tasks.description: Address a bug in the user authentication module that causes login issues for some users.

tasks.title: Optimize Database Queries for Improved Performance
tasks.description: Review and optimize database queries to enhance the overall performance of the application.

tasks.title: Add Push Notification Support
tasks.description: Integrate push notification functionality to keep users informed about important updates.

tasks.title: Design UI for Onboarding Screens
tasks.description: Create a visually appealing user interface for onboarding screens to improve user experience.

tasks.title: Refactor Code for Improved Code Readability
tasks.description: Review and refactor code to make it more readable and maintainable.

tasks.title: Implement Dark Mode Feature
tasks.description: Add support for dark mode to provide users with a personalized visual experience.
